ValidationRule.description: Prevents email domains with bad characters or formatting.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISBLANK(Email_Domain__c),FALSE, OR( LEN(Email_Domain__c)<4, LOWER(Email_Domain__c) = "none.com", LOWER(Email_Domain__c) = "null.com", LOWER(Email_Domain__c) = "unknown.com", NOT( REGEX( LEFT(Email_Domain__c, 1), "[a-zA-Z0-9]")), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_Domain__c,".")), CONTAINS(Email_Domain__c," ") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid email domain or domain format.
